name: Google AdSense
author: smiffy6969
description: Add Google AdSense adverts to your page, this requires a Google AdSense account, uses asynchronous only. Simple get your asynchronous adsense code, copy the part that looks like <ins class='adsbygoogle' style='display:inline-block;width:728px;height:90px' data-ad-client='ca-pub-1234567890123456' data-ad-slot='2345678990'></ins> and paste it into the 'INS Element' input box, when adding the extension to a page.

content_settings.name: ins_element
content_settings.label: INS Element
content_settings.placeholder: The INS element copied from your asynch google code

content_settings.name: class
content_settings.label: Class Names
content_settings.placeholder: Add classes (text-left text-right text-center mobile-show-block mobile-hide-block)
